programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping todays complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the marketmoving breaking news around the closing bell in this mustwatch daily program to get an edge on equities, earnings and the economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trumps administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Muriel experiences amnesia after being struck on the head by a piece of the farmhouse roof. Courage summons help, which arrives in the form of a French con artist duck posing as a doctor.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby try to seize an opportunity to eat a piece of cake, and it comes when they learn that Skips birthday is coming soon.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: In charge of Chowder for the weekend, Shnitzel is forced to go to Chowders favorite theme restaurant.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: While gardening, Muriel is bitten by what she thinks is a rabbit. She is transformed into a weremole that was no rabbit!, and Courage must find the antidote.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies
programme.desc: Brave Bop and Boo set off to explore the Savannah, when a LION cub, Louis, leaps out with a Roar! Louis didnt mean to scare them. He was calling his brother to take him home. The Bunnies offer to help, so Louis teaches them how to roar.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies
programme.desc: One evening on the Plains, Bop and Boo meet Batty, a friendly, BAT. Batty is surprised to find its the Bunnies bedtime, since she plays all night and sleeps all day. Keen to share, Bop and Boo take Batty on a tour of the Bunny Tent.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: Agate has a map showing the location of the wreck of her pirate ship. Our friends decide to give her a surprise by recovering the chest. However, getting to the island with the wreck turns out to be a perilous journey, full of unexpected obstacles.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: Mumfie accidentally crashes into Quartz who was carrying a large pumpkin. Now that the pumpkin is smashed, Quartz is unable to make the biggest pumpkin pie ever seen in Flutterstone. Mumfie decides to make up for it by finding a new pumpkin.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Growing Wild Project Castaway
programme.desc: When it comes to agriculture, urban farmer Chris Leow is in his comfort zone. But when it comes to aquaculture, he quickly realises that hes a little out of his depth.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with live reports and interviews to keep you uptodate on the days events.x000D

programme.title: Fact Vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Why has fake news become an industry in India? We traverse India to meet internet trolls, to understand the financial and ideological reasons that that compel them into becoming agents of misinformation.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stayathome father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Cte dAzur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter Fortress Europe. At the TurkishBulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: NEIGHBORS
programme.desc: Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Rose Byrne star in this hilarious comedy of a young married couple forced to live next to a fraternity house.

programme.title: BAD NEIGHBOURS 2
programme.desc: A couple is forced to team up with their exneighbour, also a former enemy, to deal with the new occupants next door an outofcontrol sorority.

programme.title: ENTOURAGE S8
programme.desc: Fresh from rehab, Vince is psyched about a new film idea but the guys do not share his excitement. Ari tries desperately to win back Mrs Ari.

programme.title: ENTOURAGE S8
programme.desc: Vinces movie is reimagined as TV film starring Drama, while Ari takes Lloyd on a recon mission.

programme.title: THE SHALLOWS
programme.desc: A surfer finds herself on the feeding ground of a great white shark. Though she is stranded only 200 yards from shore, survival proves to be a test of wills.

Murdered At First Sight S1
programme.desc: After a night out with friends, vulnerable India Chipchase is lured into a cab by a stranger promising to get her home safely. The following day, her body is found raped and strangled to death.

programme.title: TextMeWhenYouGetHome S1
programme.desc: When Becky Koster returned home from a night out, she texted her mother Barbara that she had made it back safely, but when Barbara arrived home later, Becky was nowhere to be found.

programme.title: The First 48 S24
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a young father is shot several times in his driveway after putting his oneyearold daughter to sleep. Detective Jason White hopes a pill bottle found on the scene will help lead to the killer.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County NJ Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Witness To Murder Digital Evidence
programme.desc: When a 17yearold transgender social media influencer goes silent, her family and fans fear foul play. Digital data ultimately allows detectives to track the movements of their suspect.

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.desc: In the race for green technology, the deep ocean is the new battleground. The ocean floor holds more of the rare earth metals we need for the energy transition than all known land deposits, a treasure trove once thought impossible to mine. But now, with the introduction of breakthrough technologies, companies from China, Canada, Norway to Russia, and beyond are competing for dominance.

programme.title: Eco Africa
programme.desc: Across Africa, renewable energy is rapidly evolving. From Zambias energy crisis sparked by droughts to Nigerias dependency on noisy diesel generators, the continent is exploring solar and battery power solutions for a brighter future.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Ten of the worlds fastest growing economies are located on the African continent. Companies in the field of science and innovation are being promoted. Climatefriendly ideas for the future are already being realized in African countries.

programme.title: No Ordinary Rescue S2
programme.desc: Why are more mammals stranding on the coast of Taiwan? While in China, thousands of migratory birds fall prey to hunters and illegal trade.

programme.title: Flavors Of... S2
programme.desc: The history, culture and architecture behind countries around the world are explored.

programme.desc: A divorcee meets a seemingly perfect match on an online dating site, only to learn that hes a scammer. When she attempts to bring him to justice, he transforms into a violent stalker.

programme.title: Vacation Home Nightmare
programme.desc: When a woman is attacked in her shortterm rental, the companys CleanUp Team steps in to help her. But she finds that the head of the team might be cleaning up his own crimes.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Cub Camp 1
programme.desc: Prepare for the summer cubs release with Roger, then meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two newbies with serious health issues who will have to stay over the winter with the Z cubs. Later, celebrate as six healthy, happy bears embark on their new life.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1
programme.desc: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a miniforest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: BRock Orchestra, Ren Jacobs Bach, Pergolesi
Daniil Trifonov, Berliner Philharmoniker, Kirill Petrenko Brahms, Wagner, Strauss
Andris Nelsons and the Berliner Philharmoniker at the Waldbhne Weber, Wagner, Strauss
Eric Clapton Unplugged...
programme.desc: ...Over 30 Years Later. Experience the legendary Eric Claptons MTV Unplugged like never before in this allnew enhanced edition, remastered with special bonus performances and unaired interviews.

programme.title: MTV 90s The Movies!
programme.desc: Grab your popcorn, MTV 90s is heading to the movies, with all the bigscreen soundtrack hits of the decade!

programme.title: Alternative Nation!
programme.desc: Become part of the 90s Alternative Nation right now on MTV 90s!

programme.title: Ultimate 90s Playlist!
programme.desc: Nothing but the best tracks and ultimate anthems from the 90s.

programme.title: MTV Live from Blackpool...
programme.desc: ... SwitchOn The Best Bits. The stunning Tower Ballroom in Blackpool plays host to some of the biggest names in pop to celebrate the annual SwitchOn of the WorldFamous Blackpool Illuminations.

programme.title: The Vamps MTV Live Stage
programme.desc: Heartthrobs The Vamps bring their Agame to MTV Live Stage, stunning fans with huge hits including All Night, Hands, Paper Hearts, Wake Up, Shades On and Middle Of The Night.

programme.title: Dua Lipa MTV Live Stage
programme.desc: Dua Lipa lights up the MTV Live Stage, rolling out huge hits such as Hotter Than Hell, Be The One and Scared To Be Lonely. Trust us, this performance is guaranteed to Blow Your Mind!

programme.title: MTV Live KSI
programme.desc: KSI takes Blackpools iconic Tower Ballroom by storm to celebrate the SwitchOn of the WorldFamous Blackpool Illuminations, with a set that includes tracks from his chart topping album!

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: Weve got big hits and theyre even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2023
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2023!

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the days news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: John Kaizan Neptune is one of the worlds leading players of the shakuhachi, a type of Japanese bamboo flute. He talks about making his own instruments and what the shakuhachi can teach us about life.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony 2 Summer
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japans oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDOLIFE On a Snowy Night
programme.desc: We come across a tranquil, snowcovered Edo cityscape. But theres something in the air the aroma of foods both sweet and savory that helped the townspeople keep warm in the winter.

programme.title: Todays CloseUp
programme.desc: The children of the cult responsible for the 1995 Tokyo nerve gas attack have remained silent about their experience ever since. Through interviews we consider what kind of support they truly needed.

programme.title: Document 72 hours
programme.desc: From beginners to pros, this gym in Tokyo welcomes people of all ages and skill levels. Each member has a unique reason for training here. We find out what theyre wrestling with in their lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: This episode looks at the point clouds for 3D data visuals used in architecture, archaeology, and autonomous driving. Plus, robots learn new moves.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the worlds biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs ones that hatch. Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Als Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdingers Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that its not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Buddy Mayor Goodways gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when its planted in the wrong place. Time for a transplant!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Its the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoes crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Map help To Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again. Dora and Boots investigate a mysterious key so they can discover more about Doras greatgreat grandma, the first exploradora.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. Baby and his family get their own reality TV show what could go wrong?

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Its the first day of school, and Sharkdogs not allowed to come well, thats never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdogs wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquariums newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquariums owner, catches on.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Georges toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: For Chefs birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. When a rumor spreads that Chef cant make a souffl, he is determined to show he can.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs cant find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBobs teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. The newly reformed Clean Bubble takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: To apologize for breaking his telescope, Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf. Handy puts together an Ateam to get his jet pack back from Gargamels hovel.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a giant snake, the other Smurfs ask her to teach them SmurfFu. When everyone is tired of changing Babys diapers, Handy decides to invent a robot that will do the job.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggys shop, they must resist jamming with the shops musical treasures. The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After hearing about a contest to find El Falcons next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing and fighting in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalos paintings as her own!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula. SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.
